solution_line_template: The factory produces {refrigerators_per_hour} + {more_coolers_than_refrigerators} = <<{refrigerators_per_hour}+{more_coolers_than_refrigerators}={coolers_per_hour}>>{coolers_per_hour} coolers per hour.
The factory works {num_days} * {hours_per_day} = <<{num_days}*{hours_per_day}={total_hours_worked}>>{total_hours_worked} hours in {num_days} days.

The factory produces ( {refrigerators_per_hour} + {coolers_per_hour}) * {total_hours_worked} = <<({refrigerators_per_hour}+{coolers_per_hour})*{total_hours_worked}={total_products_5_days}>>{total_products_5_days} products for {num_days} days.
